alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Monroe (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 11:29PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern La Crosse and southwestern Monroe Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bangor, or 9 miles west of Sparta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sparta around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include St Marys, Highway 162 And County E E, Rockland, County Roads D E And E, Mindoro Cut, Severson Coulee, Mindoro, Melvina, Nathan Hill and Veterans Memorial Park. This includes Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 11 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
